articles.description: Prince Charles, 72, gatecrashed a group of women at a 50th birthday celebration at The Ritz earlier today while on a trip to show solidarity with the hospitality sector.
articles.content:
The Prince of Wales surprised a group of women celebrating a 50th birthday when he visited The Ritz to thank staff for their 'tireless' efforts.
Charles, 72, who wore a mask, elbow-bumped the partyg… [+3127 chars]

articles.title: The Queen is 'particularly happy' for Mike and Zara Tindall after miscarriages, sources tell - Daily Mail
articles.description: Queen, 94, is 'particularly happy' Mike, 41, and Zara Tindall, 39, who live in Gloucester, are expecting after they had two miscarriages, according to Vanity Fair's Katie Nicholl.
articles.content:
The Queen is 'particularly happy' about the news Mike and Zara Tindall are expecting after the couple had two miscarriages, sources have claimed.

articles.title: ‘Mank’ star says one shot with Gary Oldman took 50 takes - NME
articles.description: Actor Ferdinand Kingsley reveals director David Fincher asked him and Gary Oldman to perform a scene nearly 50 times for Mank.
articles.content:
Actor Ferdinand Kingsley has revealed that director David Fincher asked him and Gary Oldman to perform a scene nearly 50 times while filming new movie Mank.

articles.title: Johnny Depp keeps Dior contract despite losing 'wife beater' trial - Daily Mail
articles.description: Domestic abuse lawyer Rachel Horman-Brown told MailOnline it was 'disappointing and irresponsible' that the high-end brand continues to work with the American actor.
articles.content:
Domestic abuse charities and campaigners have slammed Dior today as it continues to stick by Johnny Depp after he lost his 'wife beater' libel trial.
